item.description: Contact Information Centre for mathematical Plasma-Astrophysics (CmPA) KU Leuven Celestijnenlaan 200B, box 2400 3001 Leuven Belgium Tel. +32-04-8680-0041 +82-10-3110-6790 E-mail: daye.lim@kuleuven.be daye.lim@ksb-orb.be dayelim38@gmail.com ORCiD: 0000-0001-9914-9080 Scopus: 55694295500 Academic Career 16 Aug 2024 - Present Post-doc at KU Leuven 16 Aug 2023 - 15 Aug 2024 Post-doc at the Royal Observatory of Belgium (Joint position between KU Leuven and the Royal Observatory of Belgium) 15 Aug 2022 - 14 Aug 2023
